episodeTitle: Z's Ambition Arc - The Little Giant Lily!
description: The Straw Hats navigate the dangerous Maubeugemour Sea in the New World, encountering extreme weather phenomena. When their food mysteriously vanishes, Luffy discovers the thief is a miniature woman named Lily who can transform into a giant. She reveals she's searching for her father, Panz Fry, a giant chef imprisoned for stealing food to feed the starving. Meanwhile, the Neo Marines prepare their own plans.

events.title: Straw Hats Enter Maubeugemour Sea
events.description: Nami informs the crew that they have entered the Maubeugemour Sea, also known as the Ill-Tempered Sea, a region in the New World notorious for its mirages and outrageous weather phenomena.
events.significance: Introduction to the dangerous waters where the Z's Ambition Arc takes place, establishing the challenging New World environment.

quotes.text: We're in the Maubeugemour Sea where dangerous weather phenomena occur.
quotes.speaker: Nami
quotes.context: Warning the crew about the dangerous sea conditions

events.title: Extreme Weather Phenomena in New World
events.description: The Straw Hats encounter and survive various extreme weather phenomena including giant raindrops and hailstones larger than warships, snowfall like an avalanche, and the ocean separating to create spontaneous trenches.
events.significance: Demonstrates the unpredictable and dangerous nature of the New World's climate, similar to Paradise but even more extreme.

events.title: Mysterious Food Disappearance
events.description: After surviving the dangerous night, the crew enjoys a calm, hot day when they discover that their food is mysteriously vanishing from right under their noses. Luffy becomes determined to catch the thief.
events.significance: Sets up the discovery of Lily Enstomach and drives the plot forward.

quotes.text: Someone's stealing our food! I'm gonna catch that thief!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy's determination to find who's taking his food

events.title: Lily Enstomach's First Appearance
events.description: Luffy discovers the food thief is a miniature woman, only 5 millimeters tall, who introduces herself as Lily. She reveals that despite her tiny size, she is actually a giant who ate the Mini Mini no Mi Devil Fruit.
events.significance: Introduction of the central character of the Z's Ambition Arc and the first appearance of the Mini Mini no Mi Devil Fruit.

quotes.text: I'm Lily Enstomach! I'm actually a giant, but I ate a Devil Fruit that forced me to be small.
quotes.speaker: Lily Enstomach
quotes.context: Lily's introduction to the Straw Hats

events.title: Mini Mini Full Rebound - Lily's Giant Form
events.description: Lily demonstrates her Devil Fruit ability by transforming from her miniature 5mm size to her full giant form using the technique 'Mini Mini Full Rebound,' revealing her true enormous stature while maintaining her giant strength at any size.
events.significance: First demonstration of the Mini Mini no Mi's transformation ability, showing that Lily is the second non-canon giant to consume a Devil Fruit.

quotes.speaker: Lily Enstomach
quotes.context: Lily transforming to her giant form

events.title: Panz Fry's Story Revealed
events.description: Lily reveals she is searching for her father, Panz Fry, a giant cook famous in the New World for his Volcano Cooking and his practice of stealing food from the Marines and World Government to feed starving people. He was captured by Vice Admiral Momonga and is being transported to Impel Down.
events.significance: Establishes the motivation for the arc and introduces Panz Fry's character and noble intentions, setting up the rescue mission.

quotes.text: My father is Panz Fry, a giant cook in the New World famous for his Volcano cooking and giving stolen food to starving people.
quotes.speaker: Lily Enstomach
quotes.context: Lily explaining her father's background to the Straw Hats

events.title: Luffy Agrees to Help Rescue Panz Fry
events.description: After hearing about Panz Fry's famous cooking, especially the legendary Thousand People Paella, Luffy declares he wants to taste it and agrees to help Lily rescue her father from the Marines.
events.significance: Sets the main objective for the arc and demonstrates Luffy's characteristic motivation of helping others while also satisfying his love of food.

quotes.text: I want to try your father's cooking! Let's go save him!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy deciding to help rescue Panz Fry

events.title: Neo Marines Debut - Ain and Binz
events.description: On a Neo Marine ship in the New World, Ain and Binz are introduced as they command a fleet of Neo Marine vessels. Ain is revealed to be Z's second-in-command.
events.significance: Introduction of the Neo Marines organization and two key members who will play important roles in both this arc and One Piece Film Z.

events.title: Shuzo and Alpacacino Debut
events.description: Shuzo, a Neo Marine commander and former Marine Commodore, is introduced along with his companion Alpacacino, a bazooka that ate a Zoan Devil Fruit and can transform into an alpaca. Shuzo commands his own fleet of submarine vessels.
events.significance: Introduction of the arc's primary antagonist and the first non-canon inanimate object shown to have eaten a Zoan Devil Fruit.

events.title: Shuzo's Ambition to Replace Ain
events.description: In a conversation with Ain, Shuzo reveals his plan to kill Panz Fry to prove himself worthy of replacing Ain as Z's second-in-command, showing his ruthless ambition and rivalry.
events.significance: Establishes the antagonistic relationship and Shuzo's motivation, setting up the conflict for the arc.

quotes.text: I'm going after Lily's father to kill him so I can replace you as Z's second in command.
quotes.speaker: Shuzo
quotes.context: Shuzo revealing his plan to Ain

events.title: Straw Hats Spot Marine Convoy
events.description: The Straw Hats see approaching Marine ships transporting Panz Fry, who is chained on a giant raft and escorted by four Marine vessels crossing the Maubeugemour Sea toward Impel Down.
events.significance: Visual confirmation of Panz Fry's capture and the beginning of the rescue operation.

events.title: Luffy Declares Battle Against the Marines
events.description: Upon seeing the Marine convoy with Panz Fry, Luffy declares battle against the Marines to rescue the giant chef, setting the stage for the confrontation to come.
events.significance: The episode's climax that transitions into the next episode's action, establishing the Straw Hats' commitment to the rescue mission.

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy preparing to battle the Marines

quotes.text: We're in the Maubeugemour Sea where dangerous weather phenomena occur.
quotes.speaker: Nami
quotes.context: Informing the crew about the dangerous sea

quotes.text: I'm Lily Enstomach! I'm actually a giant, but I ate a Devil Fruit that forced me to be small.
quotes.speaker: Lily Enstomach
quotes.context: Introducing herself to the Straw Hats

quotes.text: My father is Panz Fry, a giant cook in the New World famous for his Volcano cooking and giving stolen food to starving people.
quotes.speaker: Lily Enstomach

quotes.text: I want to try your father's cooking! Let's go save him!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Agreeing to help rescue Panz Fry

quotes.text: I'm going after Lily's father to kill him so I can replace you as Z's second in command.
quotes.speaker: Shuzo

themes.description: The episode introduces Panz Fry, who steals from the World Government not for personal gain but to feed the starving, challenging the definition of right and wrong.
themes.symbolism: Panz Fry represents the conflict between legal justice and moral righteousness.

themes.description: Lily's determination to rescue her father despite the dangers demonstrates the strength of family love and loyalty.
themes.symbolism: Lily's journey mirrors the Straw Hats' own dedication to protecting their crew family.

themes.description: Shuzo's desire to replace Ain as Z's second-in-command shows how ambition can drive people to ruthless actions.
themes.symbolism: The internal competition within the Neo Marines foreshadows potential conflicts.

characterSpotlights.development: Lily is introduced as a giant with the Mini Mini no Mi Devil Fruit, searching desperately for her imprisoned father. Her gluttony and determination are established.
keyActions: Steals food from the Thousand Sunny
Convinces Luffy to help rescue Panz Fry
quotes: I'm Lily Enstomach! I'm actually a giant, but I ate a Devil Fruit that forced me to be small.

characterSpotlights.development: Luffy demonstrates his characteristic response to helping those in need, motivated by both compassion and his love of food.
quotes: I want to try your father's cooking! Let's go save him!

characterSpotlights.development: Shuzo is established as an ambitious and ruthless Neo Marine commander willing to kill to advance his position.
keyActions: Reveals his plan to kill Panz Fry
Challenges Ain's position as Z's second-in-command
quotes: I'm going after Lily's father to kill him so I can replace you as Z's second in command.

mangaDifferences.difference: This entire episode is anime-only filler content, not based on any manga chapters. It was created as a tie-in to One Piece Film Z.

trivia.fact: This is the first episode of the Z's Ambition Arc, a four-episode filler arc (episodes 575-578) created specifically as a promotional tie-in to One Piece Film Z, which was released in theaters on December 15, 2012.
The episode achieved a TV rating of 10.6% in Japan, ranking 5th for its timeslot, showing strong viewer interest in the Film Z tie-in content.

Lily Enstomach is the second non-canon giant shown to have consumed a Devil Fruit, and the Mini Mini no Mi previously appeared in the video game One Piece: Round the Land with a different user named Blyue.

sources.title: Mini Mini no Mi - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: Alpacacino is the first non-canon inanimate object shown to have eaten a Zoan-type Devil Fruit, and his name is a play on the actor Al Pacino and his species (alpaca).
The Maubeugemour Sea's name derives from French 'mauvaise humeur' meaning 'bad temper,' reflecting the sea's volatile and unpredictable nature.
Shuzo is the first member of the Longarm Tribe shown to be a former Marine and the first one confirmed to use Armament Haki.
Unlike most One Piece episodes after Episode 279, this episode had no ending song. Instead, a remix of the opening 'We Go!' was used during the next episode preview.

sources.title: One Piece Music - One Piece Wiki
